item.description:
This past weeks Movie Night went well, so we'll give it another shot.

Come visit the 360 State Street Screening Room, for a showing of:

V for Vendetta (2006)
Description from IMDB: A shadowy freedom fighter known only as "V" uses terrorist tactics to fight against his totalitarian society. Upon rescuing a girl from the secret police, he also finds his best chance at having an ally.
Stars: Hugo Weaving, Natalie Portman, John Hurt
http://www.imdb.com/t...

The date is appropriate, so I had to chose this for the movie on the 5th of November, also known as Guy Fawkes Night... "Remember, remember the Fifth of November, The Gunpowder Treason and Plot,
I know of no reason Why the Gunpowder Treason Should ever be forgot..."

If I can get at the wires to hook it up properly, we'll watch this on my HD-DVD Player. (Figure it might be an extra draw for any BETA nerds out there in the collective, otherwise I have an normal disk too.)

I Set the time for 6:30, but we will not start showing the movie until shortly after 7. Don't plan to be any later though.

Important Notes:
Unfortunately I have to limit RSVP's to 18 for theater size. Please only respond Yes if you're sure you can make it.

If you're RSVPing Yes, I will need your full names if I don't already have (or remember) them for the Concierge to let you in, and you may need ID. Please either put your name in your RSVP or e-mail it to me. (If you live in the building just let me know instead.)

Bring your own Snacks and Beverages. (Just please be careful and responsible.) Sharing is encouraged.

Sorry, 360's Parking Garage is not available to the Public yet.
item.how_to_find_us: The concierge should be able to let you in and direct you, make note of the directions near the call box. I will also try to post signs. My Cell if you have problems is 315-345-9348.
item.name: 360 Movie: "V for Vendetta" on Guy Fawkes Night
